import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import Navbar from './navbar' import { UserContext } from '../contexts/UserContext' const Layout = (props) => { const { user, checkIfLoggedIn } = useContext(UserContext) console.log(user, 'user from layout') useEffect(async () => await checkIfLoggedIn(), []) return (
Hello Next.js
{props.children}
) } export default Layout
